text: Water polo was contested at the 2015 Summer Universiade from July 2 to 14 in Gwangju, South Korea. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Medal events=== {| |- |Men | | | |- |Women | | | |} ==Men== 13 teams participated in the men's tournament. ===Teams=== ;Pool A * * * * * * * ;Pool B * * * * * * ==Women== 10 teams participated in the women's tournament. ===Teams=== ;Pool A * * * * * ;Pool B * * * * * ==References== ==External links== *2015 Summer Universiade – Water polo 2015 U Category:2015 Summer Universiade events
title: Water polo at the 2015 Summer Universiade
